title: Deleted Account?
body:
I recently transferred my account from EUW to NA (the account had started as a NA account) and it had told me that the transfer may take time etc. then i clicked the sign out option it gave me and when i tried to log into NA with the same log in info as I had been using on EUW It said that that combination of username and password don't exist on that server. I also tried logging into EUW with it and it said that the account had been moved so sign into the proper region. Also, I have waited a day assuming maybe the transfer may have taken a while.  I've tried logging into all the servers just to see if maybe I moved it to the wrong account, but it tells me the same thing. I wouldn't care had I not spent $1,500 on my account.  Rito y u steal monies from me? 

sidenote: I've already filled out a ticket, but with no response.

replies.body:
Since you've already submitted a ticket, I recommend sitting tight until an account specialist gets back to you. We've had a large volume of tickets submitted recently, so response times are a bit longer than normal.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
